channel.title: Authors on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Academic

item.description: Punyajoy Saha is an undergraduate student in the Department of Computer Science and Technology at IIEST, Shibpur. His paper “Thou shalt not Hate: Countering Online Hate Speech” got accepted at ICWSM 2019. Apart from studies, he loves playing guitar and writing short stories. Currently he is doing research in the area of machine learning, focused in social computing domain.
